name: WidgetPreviewContext
desc: A specification for the context of a widget preview.

items.name: init(family: WidgetFamily)
items.desc: Creates a context for previewing a widget or a widget’s view.

items.name: subscript<Key>(Key.Type) -> Key.Value
items.desc: Returns the context’s value for a key, or a the key’s default value if the context doesn’t define a value for the key.
